name: scifu
short_description: SCIFU stands for "Sustainable C++ Interface For uControllers. This library intends to provide a portable, reusable and maintainable way of accessing microcontroller's peripherals, like SPI, timers, Watchdogs, I2C, PWM, A2D, interrupt controllers...
